articles.author: Binoy Prabhakar
articles.title: India’s largest hospital chains abused dominance through excessive pricing, finds CCI investigation - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The potential penalty by India’s fair trade regulator could be steep. The CCI investigation is the first such action against exorbitant prices of medicines and services fixed by hospitals, which have operated free of regulation so far.
articles.content: A four-year investigation by Indias fair-trade regulator has concluded that some of Indias largest hospital chains abused their dominance through exorbitant pricing of medical services and products i… [+3338 chars]
